name: Rebel Skirmish
description:
The rebel forces are taking the fight to the imperials, and you're off on patrol, missing out on the fight of your life...or so it seems.

In the darkness, headquarters radios you. The imperials are in your home system, and they're coming for the resistance base. The only thing that stands between the rebellion's survival and their inexorable tide of destruction is your tiny ship. Can you save the rebellion? Or is it doomed to fall right before it's last gasp for victory?
